message.entry: Invalid solver specified. Provide a solver name or handle (such as 'fmincon' or @fminunc).\nType DOC OPTIMOPTIONS for a list of solvers.
Unable to create options. Install or re-install Optimization Toolbox to access OPTIMOPTIONS.
OPTIMOPTIONS does not support the 'LargeScale' option. Use the 'Algorithm' option instead.
OPTIMOPTIONS does not support {0}. Use OPTIMSET to create options for {1}.
